name: Smultron 2048
description:
Grow your own wild strawberries from seeds to deliciously red berries.

A wild strawberry themed remake of the open source puzzle game 2048 with charming pixel art.

How to play:
Use arror keys or WASD to move. When two identical plants are merged together they grow to the next stage. Grow them until the berries are ready to eat.

If the  controls don't seem to work, try clicking the game window once to give it focus.

The original 2048 game by Gabriele Cirulli can be found here.

Updated 2017-10-31: Added a button for muting the game.
